001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude.Include;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty.Access;
008import jakarta.persistence.CascadeType;
009import jakarta.persistence.Column;
010import jakarta.persistence.Entity;
011import jakarta.persistence.FetchType;
012import jakarta.persistence.GeneratedValue;
013import jakarta.persistence.Id;
014import jakarta.persistence.Index;
015import jakarta.persistence.OneToMany;
016import jakarta.persistence.OrderBy;
017import jakarta.persistence.PrePersist;
018import jakarta.persistence.Table;
019import jakarta.persistence.Temporal;
020import jakarta.persistence.TemporalType;
021import java.net.URL;
022import java.time.Instant;
023import java.util.LinkedList;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.UUID;
026import org.hibernate.annotations.CreationTimestamp;
027
028@Entity
029@Table(
030    name = "user_profile",
031    indexes = {
032        @Index(columnList = "joined")
033    }
034)
035@JsonInclude(Include.NON_NULL)
036public class User {
037
038  @Id
039  @GeneratedValue
040  @Column(name = "user_profile_id", nullable = false, updatable = false)
041  @JsonIgnore
042  private long id;
043
044  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = false, unique = true)
045  @JsonProperty(value = "key", access = Access.READ_ONLY)
046  private UUID externalKey;
047
048  @CreationTimestamp
049  @Temporal(TemporalType.TIMESTAMP)
050  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = false)
051  @JsonProperty(access = Access.READ_ONLY)
052  private Instant joined;
053
054  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = true, length = 30, unique = true)
055  private String displayName;
056
057  @Column(nullable = true, updatable = true)
058  private URL avatar;
059
060  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = false, length = 30, unique = true)
061  @JsonIgnore
062  private String oauthKey;
063
064  @OneToMany(mappedBy = "sender", fetch = FetchType.LAZY,
065      cascade = CascadeType.ALL, orphanRemoval = true)
066  @OrderBy("posted ASC")
067  @JsonIgnore
068  private final List<Message> messages = new LinkedList<>();
069  
070  public long getId() {
071    return id;
072  }
073
074  public UUID getExternalKey() {
075    return externalKey;
076  }
077
078  public Instant getJoined() {
079    return joined;
080  }
081
082  public String getDisplayName() {
083    return displayName;
084  }
085
086  public void setDisplayName(String displayName) {
087    this.displayName = displayName;
088  }
089
090  public URL getAvatar() {
091    return avatar;
092  }
093
094  public void setAvatar(URL avatar) {
095    this.avatar = avatar;
096  }
097
098  public String getOauthKey() {
099    return oauthKey;
100  }
101
102  public void setOauthKey(String oauthKey) {
103    this.oauthKey = oauthKey;
104  }
105
106  public List<Message> getMessages() {
107    return messages;
108  }
109
110  @Override
111  public int hashCode() {
112    return Long.hashCode(id);
113  }
114
115  @Override
116  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
117    boolean result;
118    if (obj == this) {
119      result = true;
120    } else if (obj instanceof User other) {
121      result = (id != 0 && id == other.id);
122    } else {
123      result = false;
124    }
125    return result;
126  }
127
128  @PrePersist
129  void generateFieldValues() {
130    externalKey = UUID.randomUUID();  
131  }
132  
133}
